fieldStaffsNote: Please add your staff Email (separated by ;) which is used to register this site. The staffs have all the privileges to manage your fields, but they do not have the privileges to edit and delete your fields
confirmFieldDelete: The following field will be deleted.
findLocationMessage: Please find your fields and click on the Start button to create your field.
tapMapMessage: Tap to add points around your field
tapOriginalMessage: Tap your original point to complete the shape
dragPointsMessage: Drag points to modify your field shape
noFieldMessage: You have no field. Please use the Add tool to add fields.
noLoggedActivities: You have not logged any activities on this crop in this year.
